org.fhnw.aigs.BinaerOperatoren.client

Class BinaerOperatorenClientGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fhnw.aigs.swingClient.gameHandling.ClientGame
      • org.fhnw.aigs.BinaerOperatoren.client.BinaerOperatorenClientGame

  • public class BinaerOperatorenClientGame
extends org.fhnw.aigs.swingClient.gameHandling.ClientGame
    This class represents the client side of the BinaerOperatorenSpiel.
    v1.0 Initial release
    v1.0.1 Minor changes due to versioning of the program (Program version is v1.1)
    Version:
    v1.0.1
    Author:
